Conjuration 7

Wild Hunt
Ritual
N6
spell id [id]: 851
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 75
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 50N
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Wild Hunt
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster unleashes the Wild Hunt upon the world. The Hunt is led by Herne the Lord of the Hunt, an ancient deity of the wild roaming the woodlands in search of those who have offended the wild and its inhabitants. When the Hunt has been called, powerful priests of enemy faiths will be hunted down for as long as the Lord is not slain.
The Wild Hunt targets enemy priests located in forest provinces. Apart from the main hunt led by Herne the Lord of the Hunt, there are two lesser hunts without the Lord.
